title: Blood, Bone And A Witches Kiss
description: A monster, Witches and winged Fairies were the last thing Avner had in mind when his mother dragged him to rural Ohio. Just getting through his senior year, a car and a job were his plan. An early frost, a taunting black haired girl and a kiss in the dusty cellar of an old barn seals his fate in the unpredictable worlds of The Orb.
author: W.C. Quick
